eu.cqse.check.framework.core

Interface ICheckContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestCheckContext

    public interface ICheckContext
    Context interface for custom checks, that provides custom check related functionality to a custom check.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createFindingForElement(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a finding with the given message for the whole analyzed token element.
      void createFindingForLines(java.lang.String message, int startLine, int endLine)
      Creates a finding with the given message from the given start line (inclusive) to the given end line (inclusive).
      void createFindingForOffsets(java.lang.String message, int startOffset, int endOffset)
      Creates a finding with the given message from the given start offset (inclusive) to the given end offset (inclusive).
      java.util.List<ShallowEntity> getAbstractSyntaxTree()
      Returns the abstract syntax tree of the analyzed token element as list of shallow entities.
      ELanguage getLanguage()
      Returns the language of the analyzed token element.
      org.conqat.lib.commons.logging.ILogger getLogger()
      Returns a logger, which may be used to indicate problems in situations where the check may continue.
      ShallowEntity getRootEntity()
      Returns the synthetic root entity of the abstract syntax tree.
      java.lang.String getTextContent()
      Returns the text content of the analyzed token element.
      java.util.List<IToken> getTokens()
      Returns the tokens of the analyzed token element.
      ITypeResolution getTypeResolution()
      Returns a type resolution, which contains information about known variables and their types.
      java.util.List<ShallowEntity> getUnfilteredAbstractSyntaxTree()
      Returns the abstract syntax tree based on the unfiltered text content.
      ShallowEntity getUnfilteredRootEntity()
      Returns the synthetic root entity of the abstract syntax tree based on the unfiltered content (see also getUnfilteredTextContent()).
      java.lang.String getUnfilteredTextContent()
      Returns the unfiltered text context of the analyzed token element.
      java.util.List<IToken> getUnfilteredTokens()
      Returns the list of tokens based on the unfiltered text content.
      ITypeResolution getUnfilteredTypeResolution()
      Returns the type resolution based on the unfiltered text content.
      java.lang.String getUniformPath()
      Returns the uniform path of the analyzed token element.

    • Method Detail

      • getLanguage

        ELanguage getLanguage()
        Returns the language of the analyzed token element.

      • getUniformPath

        java.lang.String getUniformPath()
        Returns the uniform path of the analyzed token element.

      • getTokens

        java.util.List<IToken> getTokens()
                          throws CheckException
        Returns the tokens of the analyzed token element.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getTextContent

        java.lang.String getTextContent()
                         throws CheckException
        Returns the text content of the analyzed token element. The returned content is filtered, e.g. generated code is not included. For most checks this will be the preferred form of the content, as usually no findings shall be generated for filtered code.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getUnfilteredTextContent

        java.lang.String getUnfilteredTextContent()
                                   throws CheckException
        Returns the unfiltered text context of the analyzed token element. The returned content may include generated code. In general, checks should use getTextContent() and only very specific checks should need to access the raw content.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getRootEntity

        ShallowEntity getRootEntity()
                     throws CheckException
        Returns the synthetic root entity of the abstract syntax tree. This method can be used, if the executing check requests the ECheckParameter.ABSTRACT_SYNTAX_TREE parameter.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getUnfilteredRootEntity

        ShallowEntity getUnfilteredRootEntity()
                               throws CheckException
        Returns the synthetic root entity of the abstract syntax tree based on the unfiltered content (see also getUnfilteredTextContent()). This method can be used, if the executing check requests the ECheckParameter.ABSTRACT_SYNTAX_TREE parameter.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getAbstractSyntaxTree

        java.util.List<ShallowEntity> getAbstractSyntaxTree()
                                             throws CheckException
        Returns the abstract syntax tree of the analyzed token element as list of shallow entities. This method can be used, if the executing check requests the ECheckParameter.ABSTRACT_SYNTAX_TREE parameter.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getTypeResolution

        ITypeResolution getTypeResolution()
                           throws CheckException
        Returns a type resolution, which contains information about known variables and their types. This method can be used, if the executing check request the ECheckParameter.TYPE_RESOLUTION parameter.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getLogger

        org.conqat.lib.commons.logging.ILogger getLogger()
        Returns a logger, which may be used to indicate problems in situations where the check may continue. In more severe cases, a CheckException should be thrown instead.

      • createFindingForElement

        void createFindingForElement(java.lang.String message)
                      throws CheckException
        Creates a finding with the given message for the whole analyzed token element.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • createFindingForLines

        void createFindingForLines(java.lang.String message,
                           int startLine,
                           int endLine)
                    throws CheckException
        Creates a finding with the given message from the given start line (inclusive) to the given end line (inclusive).
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • createFindingForOffsets

        void createFindingForOffsets(java.lang.String message,
                             int startOffset,
                             int endOffset)
                      throws CheckException
        Creates a finding with the given message from the given start offset (inclusive) to the given end offset (inclusive).
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getUnfilteredAbstractSyntaxTree

        java.util.List<ShallowEntity> getUnfilteredAbstractSyntaxTree()
                                                       throws CheckException
        Returns the abstract syntax tree based on the unfiltered text content. (see also getUnfilteredTextContent())
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getUnfilteredTypeResolution

        ITypeResolution getUnfilteredTypeResolution()
                                     throws CheckException
        Returns the type resolution based on the unfiltered text content. (see also getUnfilteredTextContent())
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getUnfilteredTokens

        java.util.List<IToken> getUnfilteredTokens()
        Returns the list of tokens based on the unfiltered text content. (see also getUnfilteredTextContent())
